creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
medium: Pressure prints (relief) with screenprinting, stab-bound volume with tortoise-stitching
text: Bound artists' book with 104 pages printed front and back in multiple colors featuring various arrangements of semi-abstracted heads, entangled bodies, and handprints layered and re-layered atop one another, creating a cinematic-like experience. Several pages feature patterns of a layered and repeating English-language text quotation selected from a Gertrude Stein novel.
title: Untitled (Loving Repeating 3)
